手游1000小时玩家，入端游，对于这个游戏，一般般吧。我主要玩屠夫，真的人类太强了，加一台机完全不过分，把把血压高，还有，角色都太贵了，我是学生，几十几百的买暗金真负担不起，手游起码还能肝，这端游只能氪，要我说要么买断没内购，要么内购不买断，要么买断有内购没有只能氪金的货币，你好歹让我肝点暗金吧

Hacen una actualización para que no te tunneleen (te cuelguen una y otra vez hasta sacarte de la partida) y la gente lo hace igual, si es que no te toca con tóxicos de mierda jugando de asesino, te tocan tóxicos de mierda jugando de superviviente, además que por regla general si no te tocan compañeros inútiles o que se niegan a cooperar, te toca un asesino más tryhard que la puta que si no saca las 4 kills es incapaz de disfrutar el juego, dios mio que gente.  Literalmente es casi imposible divertirse a día de hoy en este juego

Conclusión: ya no vale la pena

Cada vez más malo el juego, supuestamente con la actualización para evitar el tuneleo lograron hacer que los asesinos te hagan facecamp, proxycamp y todo el campeo posible, no dan ganas de jugar ni de asesino ni superviviente, al final es botar el dinero a la basura.

The game has really went downhill since the most recent update. I have been playing survivor, and now we barely get one generator done before all getting killed. The killers are way overpowered, and in conjunction with tunneling and camping, the game is not fun anymore. As the killer, I am mostly killing everyone every match, and I am not even that good. I will not be playing this game anymore or buying anything else until the issue is resolved.

我的评价是:寄！！！～

I have bought this game on playstation, xbox, and on steam. I have dumped a ton of money and hours into this game. I recommend NOT buying this game/wasting your money unless your idea of fun is being camped, tunneled and spending a majority of your time on the hook if you are playing survivor after the new update. I don't care what the baby killers whine about, this game is completely unbalanced/unfair as of the moment. The generators now take longer to repair, but take EVEN LONGER with specific killer perks. Most of the time after the new update, not one generator is finished before the match is over. Meanwhile killers still get to have broken add ons/top tier perks, and also some killers being able to one hit down. So the matches are over before you even get into one. The devs wanted the killers to be more intimidating, but being slugged/tunneled/camped is not intimidating. It is frustrating and makes the game not worth the time playing. DO NOT buy this game until the balance is fixed.

HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS GAME! Do not listen to the people who give this poor reviews, they probably play as Meg Thomas and constantly fail to evade the killers. Always a blast alone, and even more so with friends.

I would NOT purchase this in it's current state of the game. What I mean by that is, their most recent update has completely ruined the balance for both survivors and killers. It is way too EASY to get kills as a killer now. It is not challenging or fun. From a survivor's perspective, expect to be tunneled/camped every game, and games to take over 15-20 minutes long. 

In short, you either play a role that has training wheels without any challenges and the feeling of reward or skill, play killer, or if you want to feel miserable every game because BHVR devs decided to nerf survivors to the ground, play survivor.
Overall good game i have it on all my consoles

Needs a lot of work even after years of it being released, A lot of it is because the game is unbalanced,mechanics of the games seem rough and also in need of a lot of work and more killer oriented.
a few problems i saw in the games i played are :
there's no point for the wiggle mechanic(getting out of the killer's arm) you never have enough time to get off since there pretty much hooks around every corners.
Another mechanic that is useless are flashlights you have to keep the light on the face of the killers most of the time its undoable since the killer can easily look away or just turn around and hit you since you know they still go the same speed most of the time 
another mechanic are the hooks even with skills you can't get off since the percentage is so low.
Some of the killers are OP and people tend to abuse it so you only get to see 3-4 killers. Rarely you will see another THOSE games are fun :)
If you ever played league of legends you know their team is incapable of doing proper balance change.Guess what ? so does this game's dev teams they seem to add stuff every patch but nothing actually change.
for exemple has of 6.1.0 they buffed 4 perks for hunters and pretty much debuff a lot of survivor perks.in this patch they overly f*cked over the survivor.
For killers  i have said earlier they are indeed OP each of them destroys a mechanic or make the game not even fun 
for exemple: 
The doctor with his zone attack you cant hide from him and when he does it you cant do an action so you planned on jumping over that window ? think again you are stuck there.
There's so much more that could be said about the sorry state this game is.

This game is very fun and has great gameplay

The game was enjoyable when I started but honestly there are so many issues it's insane. 
The balance needs something figured out. The game is beyond Killer heavy and there are four survivors. It's genuinely sad. 

Major things in the game that are supposed to allow survivors to get away and continue on just don't work. The amount of cheating is insane. If you have Barbecue and Chili, or another relatable perk, then I can see how you knew the EXACT location of all of the survivors, but when you have killers that have one perk and they just have the ability to pinpoint all locations it's a little extra sus. 

Pallets are set in the game so you can utilize them to stun, get around, or get away from a killer. However, if you were what is deemed "to close" to the side of the pallets they don't work and you just get hit by the killer. 

Window jumping is essentially useless as you can still be struck by the killer even if they are a distance behind you. Oh, did I mention Lithe, Dance with Me and other helpful vaulting perks don't do a thing to change that? No matter what, the killer CAN reach you after a fully successful vault. 

This game was once enjoyable but is now just a shit show. I've sent clips and thorough bug reports to the devs, it's not the first Beta like game I've played and it's not he first game I've tested. I gave an abundance of information and I'm sure that others have as well. The Devs seem to focus more on the deals they can get with outside sources for licensing and cosmetics. 

Especially with the anniversary just happening you'd think the game would be in a better stage as far as basic developmental bugs go. 

I still play the game for some reason with my friends, but can't last more than 5 games because of the atrocities I run into. 

Give it a go if you find nothing better.

The devs have no clue what flow of the game really is like and can't balance it to save their lives.
Good concept but terrible attempt at "balancing" killers vs survivors.

never

After July 21st 2022's update review : (Face) Camping and tunneling still a thing. Even in low and high rank (Even in Iridescent 1).
Base kit Borrowed Time + Borrowed Time perk still useless against it, Especially after Decisive Strike's nerf to 3 seconds from 5 seconds. And the camper killer can just hook downed rescuer in exchange anyways so no point.

About Killer's side I think it's pretty balanced right now. Except Survivor's side.

Would I recommend this game during the sale right now? 

"NO"

Get away from this mess until they fixed camping and MMR issue.

My suggestion to fix the issue is to make base kit borrowed time 2-3 seconds longer, Revert DS or make Kinship for every hook stage a base kit but as long as the killer is within 8-16m radius. I know asking for Kinship base kit is a bit too much, But I would be more punishing for killer to camp and someone nearby while other 2 survivors doing gens.

Dev team did a pretty good job for this balance update so far...But it still didn't fix the camping issue at all.

Comprei com a ideia de jogar com em sala fechada, com os sobreviventes e o killer sendo meus amigos, porém não rolou, continuei jogando sozinho e de fato jogar solo, ou pelo menos com um ou dois sobreviventes na party faz uma diferença. O jogar solo pode se tornar complicado pq muitos sobreviventes fazer várias coisas que matam o time. 
Apesar disso e do processo de aprendizagem do jogo levar um tempinho, depois que pega realmente se torna agradável independente dos teammates, uma vez que tu joga fazendo o seu. Recomendo o jogo pelas incontáveis horas que tenho e a diversão que tive com ele

Je l'aurai bien recommandé, mais depuis la mise à jour, c'est encore pire qu'avant... 
Les perks auraient été modifiées pour changer la méta du jeu et empêcher les tueurs de camper et de tunnel. Que nenni. Maintenant, les tueurs sont devenus OP et côté survivant, on se retrouve avec des générateurs plus longs à faire, des trousses de soin qui permettaient de se soigner complètement, qui ne soignent plus jusqu'au bout, des nerfs de perks... 
Bref, depuis la mise à jour, je trouve difficile de prendre plaisir à jouer à dbd. En espérant que les devs fassent un petit sondage suite à la mise à jour, parce que je ne pense pas que je sois la seule à être décue par cette dernière "avancée".

i bought this game 2-3 years ago... and tbh i prefer the old dead by daylight because it had simple controls and simple movement... not only that... the killers and surivors were pretty balanced... and now in 2022 the game is super unbalanced... the perks to survivors are useless... and for the killers these perks helps them win easier... i havent won a single game where the killers actually plays the game... i have only won the games where killers does absolute nothing.... what i want from this game is to be balanced... perks needs to be effective against killers... and last but not least... mechanics... i loved the old mechanics where u had wiggle out using 2 buttons repeadetly.... but the new wiggle... its strange and completelly useless.... if there is that new wiggle then remove 5 hooks around the game... because i noticed walking around the map... i always ended up knocked out nearby the hook.... which pisses me off the most
